meanings.definition: To shuffle again or in a different way.
meanings.sent1: She reshuffles the deck of cards before every game.
meanings.sent2: He always reshuffles his playlist to discover new music.
meanings.sent3: The magician reshuffles the cards, making the audience gasp in amazement.
meanings.sent4: The wind reshuffles the fallen leaves, creating a beautiful pattern on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The chef reshuffles the ingredients, creating a unique and delicious dish.

meanings.definition: The act of shuffling again or in a different way.
meanings.sent1: After the reshuffle, the cards were perfectly mixed.
meanings.sent2: The reshuffle of the cabinet led to new faces in the government.
meanings.sent3: The sudden reshuffle of seating arrangements caused confusion among the guests.
meanings.sent4: The reshuffle of responsibilities at work brought fresh challenges.
meanings.sent5: The reshuffle of the books on the shelf made it easier to find the desired one.
